description: Armelle`s Furfrou participated in the first Pok√©mon Styling round of the Hiyoku Tripokalon Rookie Class Tournament. Armelle styled it to look like a Pharaoh Trim Furfrou for that round. It was up against Shauna`s Bulbasaur and Jessie`s Pumpkaboo but the audience did not vote enough for it, so Shauna advanced to the next stage and Armelle was eliminated from the tournament.
name: Trimmien (Armelle)
